spec_data.Name: texlive-dirtytalk
spec_data.Description:
The package provides a macro to typeset quotations, using the
command \say{stuff}. The quotation mark glyphs are inserted by
the macro; nested quotations are detected.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:48:34 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A package to typeset quotations easier
